images.name: Outside of the Hut
images.description: A small, moss-covered wooden hut sits in a clearing amidst the dense forest. Its roof is overgrown with vines, and the door hangs ajar. Various herbs and plants are scattered haphazardly around the hut, and a long-neglected garden of mysterious plants thrives in the wild outside.

images.name: Morrowsend Market
images.description: A vibrant day in Morrowsend's bustling marketplace, where merchants display their wares and buskers entertain the crowd with enchanting tunes. A testament to the lively spirit of the townsfolk.

images.name: Morrowsend Town Hall
images.description: Morrowsend's grand town hall, adorned with intricate carvings and bathed in the golden glow of the setting sun. A symbol of governance and unity in the heart of the town.

images.name: Weeping Willow Tavern
images.description: A cozy evening at The Weeping Willow Tavern, where patrons gather to share stories, laughter, and camaraderie over hearty meals and refreshing drinks. A warm refuge in the quaint town of Morrowsend.
